entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023
